member.name: T:System.Net.Http.WebRequestHandler
member.summary: Implements a transport handler using instances to send HTTP requests to servers.

member.name: M:System.Net.Http.WebRequestHandler.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:System.Net.Http.WebRequestHandler.AllowPipelining
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to pipeline the request to the Internet resource.
member.returns: Returns .true if the request should be pipelined; otherwise, false. The default is true.

member.name: P:System.Net.Http.WebRequestHandler.AuthenticationLevel
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the level of authentication and impersonation used for this request.
member.returns: Returns .A bitwise combination of the values. The default value is .

member.name: P:System.Net.Http.WebRequestHandler.CachePolicy
member.summary: Gets or sets the cache policy for this request.
member.returns: Returns .A object that defines a cache policy. The default is .

member.name: P:System.Net.Http.WebRequestHandler.ClientCertificates
member.summary: Gets or sets the collection of security certificates that are associated with this request.
member.returns: Returns .The collection of security certificates associated with this request.

member.name: P:System.Net.Http.WebRequestHandler.ContinueTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of time, in milliseconds, the application will wait for 100-continue from the server before uploading data.
member.returns: Returns .The amount of time, in milliseconds, the application will wait for 100-continue from the server before uploading data. The default value is 350 milliseconds.

member.name: P:System.Net.Http.WebRequestHandler.ImpersonationLevel
member.summary: Gets or sets the impersonation level for the current request.
member.returns: Returns .The impersonation level for the request. The default is .

member.name: P:System.Net.Http.WebRequestHandler.MaxResponseHeadersLength
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum allowed length of the response headers.
member.returns: Returns .The length, in kilobytes (1024 bytes), of the response headers.

member.name: P:System.Net.Http.WebRequestHandler.ReadWriteTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets a time-out in milliseconds when writing a request to or reading a response from a server.
member.returns: Returns .The number of milliseconds before the writing or reading times out. The default value is 300,000 milliseconds (5 minutes).

member.name: P:System.Net.Http.WebRequestHandler.UnsafeAuthenticatedConnectionSharing
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to allow high-speed NTLM-authenticated connection sharing.
member.returns: Returns .true to keep the authenticated connection open; otherwise, false.
